pages.title: Straw
pages.text: Straw can be obtained by cutting tall grass(guranteed), wheat or rice with a $(l:basics/knife)knife$() and can be used in crafting recipes and can be crafted to a decorative Straw $(l:basics/storage_blocks)Bale$().

pages.info: Canvas can be used in various crafting recipes(Painting, Book, Scaffolding)
